insert into text
id,
title,
context,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update text
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
context = #{record.context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
update text set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context = #{record.context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update text
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
context = #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
